subject: A dumb idea that sold 12 million copies
body:
My simple idea sold over 12 million copies of a single book and allowed me to start a world-famous training business. 
Now, I want to "take you by the hand" and show you how to turn your simple idea into a business reality... and possibly... 

into a windfall fortune!
See how it works >>
